net.sf.freecol.client.gui.panel

Class FreeColProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.sf.freecol.client.gui.panel.FreeColProgressBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FreeColProgressBar
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Implements a simple progress bar suitable for use with FreeCol. Unlike JProgressBar, it also displays the expected increase next turn as well as the estimated time until completion. Used in the colony panel for the building progress.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
